name: HuoChaiRenRPG
description:
"Matchman RPG" is a self-made RPG role-playing game. The protagonist of the game is a C race with a match like figure. After a long time of cultivation, he said goodbye to his master and decided to go to the outside world. What kind of experience will he encounter along the way? Let's go to the game to find the answer!

Game features:
Attribute point
A character gains 5 attribute points for each level, which can be used to increase strength, agility and intelligence.
Strength increases the power and HP of physical attack by 5HP for each point added;
Agility improves attack hit rate, critical hit rate, HP and MP, and increases 3HP and 3MP for each point added;
Intelligence increases the power of magic attack and MP, and increases 5MP for each point added.

Skill tree
Game skills are divided into physics, magic and other three kinds. A character gains 1 skill point every time he is promoted. There is a level limit for advanced skills.
Physics Department: physical skills, with the effect of combo and critical hit;
Magic: magic skills, group attack, high explosive damage;
Others: add character attributes, restore skills, buff skills.

Mission system
The game is divided into main line task and linear task. There is only one main line task. You can view the current task in the notebook in the package. The branch line task needs to talk with the NPC in the town to get the equipment, gold coins and other props.
